name: Spin Pin
description:
Spin Pin was made for ScoreSpace Jam #14.  

COMMENT BELOW YOUR HIGHSCORE!!!

GAME WORKS BEST IN WINDOWS AND/OR MAC BUILDS. YOU CAN USE THE WEBGL BUILD BUT THE OTHER BUILD WORK BETTER.

Use the left mouse button to shoot a pin. When the pin hits the black box you get a point. Use the right mouse button to stop the rotation of the black box. Merge 2 pins of the same color to remove them from the board and get a point. Hit a pin of another color to end the game. Good luck!
